[City Council](https://merkeltexas.com/city-council/ "Permalink to City Council")
=================================================================================



Merkel City Council meetings are held on the third Tuesday of each month, unless otherwise stated, at 6:00 pm at Heritage Hall, located at 111 Taylor Street. Please visit the City Government page to view the agenda and check for any changes to dates and/or location.

* ***Mayor***
  Ray Cobb
* **Place 1**
  Matthew Riggan
* **Place 2**
  Tyler Newberry
* **Place 3**
  Collin Jacobs
* **Place 4**
  Vacant
* **Place 5**
  Elaine Chaney

Merkel City Hall – (325)928-4911

If you are interested in running for city council or mayor, you must, among other requirements:​

* be at least 18 years old on the date of the election
* be a registered voter and have lived in the State of Texas for at least 12 consecutive months prior to the filing date for the election,
* be a resident in your city for at least 12 months prior to the filing date for the election of Mayor, and be a resident in your city for at least 6 months prior to the filing date for the election of Alderman

The next scheduled city elections will be held Saturday, May 2, 2026.

* Mayor (unexpired term)
* Place 1 ( 2 year term)
* Place 2  (2 year term)
* Place 3  (2 year term)
* Place 4 (unexpired term)

For more information or to check for additional requirements, please contact the City Secretary.
